protocol_name: Illumina Small RNA cloning protocol using Random Adapters
protocol_name_html: Illumina Small RNA cloning protocol using Random Adapters
description: This protocol corrects small RNAs deep sequencing biases caused by RNA ligases. The key modification is the use of pooled adapters with the sequences below. See the cited publication for further details.
affiliation: Oncological Sciences, Mount Sinai, NY and Girihlet Inc.

components.data: Section I: Size selection and Gel purification of RNA sample
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Section I: Size selection and Gel purification of RNA sample

components.data: Prepare a 12% polyacrylamide/urea gel (thickness will depend on the amount of total RNA being run. As a guide, we use 1.0mm for <20µg,1.5mm for >20µg).
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Prepare a 12% polyacrylamide/urea gel (thickness will depend on the amount of total RNA being run. As a guide, we use 1.0mm for <20µg,1.5mm for >20µg).

components.data: Spike RNA samples with 32P-labeled 19, 24, 28 and/or 33bp oligos (~10,000 counts per oligo, per minute) – depending on the application.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Spike RNA samples with 32P-labeled 19, 24, 28 and/or 33bp oligos (~10,000 counts per oligo, per minute) – depending on the application.

components.data: Load the sample(s) and run the gel at constant 10W for 1-1.5 hrs (until the first dye front reaches the middle of the gel).
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Load the sample(s) and run the gel at constant 10W for 1-1.5 hrs (until the first dye front reaches the middle of the gel).

components.data: Add an equal amount of Gel Loading Buffer II (1X), heat samples at 95C for 5 minutes.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Add an equal amount of Gel Loading Buffer II (1X), heat samples at 95C for 5 minutes.

components.data: Chill on ice for 1 minute.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Chill on ice for 1 minute.

components.data: Carefully grind gel slices by hand using a pestle.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Carefully grind gel slices by hand using a pestle.

components.data: Expose a phosphor-screen over the gel for 10-15 minutes (time will vary depending on radioactivity intensity and imager sensitivity)
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Expose a phosphor-screen over the gel for 10-15 minutes (time will vary depending on radioactivity intensity and imager sensitivity)

components.data: Add 420µL of 0.4M NaCl.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Add 420µL of 0.4M NaCl.

components.data: Spin briefly in a centrifuge at maximum speed.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Spin briefly in a centrifuge at maximum speed.

components.data: Flash freeze samples for 1 minute in a bath of EtOH and dry ice.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Flash freeze samples for 1 minute in a bath of EtOH and dry ice.

components.data: Transfer eluant to a fresh microcentrifuge tube.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Transfer eluant to a fresh microcentrifuge tube.

components.data: Add 20µg GlycoBlue, mix, and add 2.5 volumes of 100% EtOH
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Add 20µg GlycoBlue, mix, and add 2.5 volumes of 100% EtOH

components.data: Spin at 4C for 30 minutes.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Spin at 4C for 30 minutes.

components.data: Incubate at -20C for 3-6+ hours.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Incubate at -20C for 3-6+ hours.

components.data: Air dry for <5 min and resuspend pellet in 13µL DEPC-MilliQ H20
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Air dry for <5 min and resuspend pellet in 13µL DEPC-MilliQ H20

components.data: Here, one can insert a gel slice into a dialyzer tube (Novagen, D-Tube Dialyzer Midi, MWCO 3.5 kDA – Cat. No. 71506-3) along with 450ul of water.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Here, one can insert a gel slice into a dialyzer tube (Novagen, D-Tube Dialyzer Midi, MWCO 3.5 kDA – Cat. No. 71506-3) along with 450ul of water.

components.data: Reverse the poles and run for 2 minutes to pull the sample off the dialysis tubing wall
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Reverse the poles and run for 2 minutes to pull the sample off the dialysis tubing wall

components.data: Position the dialyzer into a gel box, submerged in 1xTAE, such that the dialysis tubing has the current running perpendicularly through it.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Position the dialyzer into a gel box, submerged in 1xTAE, such that the dialysis tubing has the current running perpendicularly through it.

components.data: Pull out all of the water into a fresh microcentrifuge tube, mix in 20µg GlycoBlue and add 2.5 volumes of 100% EtOH
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Pull out all of the water into a fresh microcentrifuge tube, mix in 20µg GlycoBlue and add 2.5 volumes of 100% EtOH

components.data: Wash with 70% EtOH and then remove ALL EtOH.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Wash with 70% EtOH and then remove ALL EtOH.

components.data: Spin at 4C for 30 minutes
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Spin at 4C for 30 minutes

components.data: Wash with 70% EtOH and then remove ALL EtOH
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Wash with 70% EtOH and then remove ALL EtOH

components.data: Air dry for <5 min and resuspend pellet in 13µL DEPC-MilliQ H20
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Air dry for <5 min and resuspend pellet in 13µL DEPC-MilliQ H20

components.data: Run at 100V for 18mins.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Run at 100V for 18mins.

components.data: Set up the ligation mix as described in the cited publication.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Set up the ligation mix as described in the cited publication.

components.data: Incubate at 37C for 4 hours
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Incubate at 37C for 4 hours

components.data: Add 20µl Gel Loading Buffer II
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Add 20µl Gel Loading Buffer II

components.name: Description

components.name: Description

components.name: Description

components.name: Description

components.data: Split into two tubes (9µL each)
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Split into two tubes (9µL each)

components.data:
Add either 1µL Superscript III RT (Invitrogen) (+RT)
or 1µL DEPC-MilliQ H20 (-RT control)
components.name: Description

Add either 1µL Superscript III RT (Invitrogen) (+RT)
